modName: Health Magic and Stamina Potion Weight Adjuster
summary: This mod reduces the weight of lesser HMS (health, magic, stamina) pots, which should make life a little easier for lower-level characters. However, it slightly increases (0.5 -> 0.6) the weight of the highest level (ultimate) HMS pots, just to be nice and linear. Crafted potions are unaffected at this time.
descriptionHtml:
Health, Magicka and Stamina Potion Weight Adjuster by ZHOOL

Pots can quickly bloat a player's inventory. This mod reduces the weight of lesser HMS (health, magic, stamina) pots, which should make life a little easier for lower-level characters. However, it slightly increases (0.5 -> 0.6) the weight of the highest level (ultimate) HMS pots, just to be nice and linear.
Crafted potions are unaffected at this time.

--- new pot weights ---

minor hms       0.1
hms                0.2
plentiful hms    0.3
vigorous hms    0.4
extreme hms    0.5
ultimate hms    0.6

installation: copy the .esp file to your skyrim\data directory, and activate using the data files option on the skyrim splash screen. load after any mods that change these particular potions. current encumbrance will be re-calculated appropriately when adding or removing the mod.
